text: Thanks, they let you work in node.js but is there any  possibility to integrate with the Visual studio?
There is the. VS code extension mentioned on the efficient workflow page. Could you elaborate on what you mean?

I actually have read about the vs code extension, but since I'm a .Net developer, and been working around Visual studio. Now I want to get my hands dirty with HubSpot so is there any possibility to use it in visual studio? or how to use it for the .Net application?
